topic.title: Use case vs Task
topic.shortdesc: Use case from the user point of view is the specific result that the user want to achieve by making some actions within software product. As far as use case is a term mainly used within software domain we may use more general term and establish Task entity. Task entity is a set of steps that have to be done to reach a specific result.

body.p: Task entity is provided to ease understanding software product features and what benefits they provide to a software user. Task entity helps to understand relationships between software feature, DBOS component, data, data sources from the one hand, and how software features relates to GUI elements, such as UI workspace, UI pages, UI controls from the other hand. Using mentioned above entities ontology relationships may be build.

Knowledge Base provides the information that may be needed to handle tasks and step by step guidance how to get information within the table of content or using searching or AI wile handling the task. Knowledge Base doesn't provide instructions of how to handle task as it is, just information you may need.
